title: Vidal (footballer, born 1896)
text: Sylvio Vidal Leite Ribeiro (born 1 October 1896, date of death unknown), known simply as Vidal, was a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">footballer</a>. He played in four matches for the <a href="Brazil%20national%20football%20team">Brazil national football team</a> in 1917. He was also part of Brazil's squad for the <a href="1917%20South%20American%20Championship">1917 South American Championship</a>.
